bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for EthernetAmendment 1: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Extended Ethernet Passive Optical Networks
IEEE Standard for EthernetAmendment 1: Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Extended Ethernet Passive Optical Networks
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.3bk/D3.1, May 2013 (Amendment of IEEE Std 802.3-2012)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3 defines the physical layer specifications and management parameters for EPON operation on point-to-multipoint passive optical networks supporting extended power budget classes of PX30, PX40, PRX40, and PR40 PMDs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
